entry.title: Ava leaves the lab
entry.content: Recently graduated senior Ava Kloss-Schmidt leaves the lab after 2.5 great years developing bean genetic resources and optimizing herbivory assays. Good luck at Carnegie Ava!
entry.summary: Recently graduated senior Ava Kloss-Schmidt leaves the lab after 2.5 great years developing bean genetic resources and optimizing herbivory assays. Good luck at Carnegie Ava!

entry.title: Steinbrenner lab at Plant Bio 22
entry.content: We will be making the short trip to PB22 in Portland, OR. 4 lab members will present posters, and Natalia will give a talk on plant-herbivore interactions! Link to titles
entry.summary: We will be making the short trip to PB22 in Portland, OR. 4 lab members will present posters, and Natalia will give a talk on plant-herbivore interactions! Link to titles

entry.title: Tonio leaves for grad school at UC Berkeley

link.title: Tonio leaves for grad school at UC Berkeley

entry.content: Tonio has left to prepare to start at UC Berkeley PMB’s PhD program in August. He is our first full-time departure since we started the lab in 2019. Good luck Tonio!
entry.summary: Tonio has left to prepare to start at UC Berkeley PMB’s PhD program in August. He is our first full-time departure since we started the lab in 2019. Good luck Tonio!

entry.title: Ben Sheppard joins the lab
entry.content: 1st year graduate student Ben S has joined the lab. Welcome Ben!
entry.summary: 1st year graduate student Ben S has joined the lab. Welcome Ben!

entry.title: Adam speaks at Plant Genomes Online meeting

link.title: Adam speaks at Plant Genomes Online meeting

entry.content: Adam presented our lab’s recent preprint at the PGO meeting. You can view a talk recording here: Youtube link
entry.summary: Adam presented our lab’s recent preprint at the PGO meeting. You can view a talk recording here: Youtube link

entry.title: Tonio and Anthony receive the NSF-GRFP

link.title: Tonio and Anthony receive the NSF-GRFP

entry.content: Awesome news: the lab’s first two members, Anthony Garcia and Tonio Chaparro, were awarded the NSF-GRFP! Tonio joined as a technician and Anthony as an undergraduate researcher (now technician). Congrats!
entry.summary: Awesome news: the lab’s first two members, Anthony Garcia and Tonio Chaparro, were awarded the NSF-GRFP! Tonio joined as a technician and Anthony as an undergraduate researcher (now technician). Congrats!

entry.title: New preprint describing PRR Evolution
entry.content: New work is available in BioRxiv: Evolutionary gain and loss of a plant pattern-recognition receptor for HAMP recognition (link). Congrats Simon and Anthony! Adam’s twitter summary is here
entry.summary: New work is available in BioRxiv: Evolutionary gain and loss of a plant pattern-recognition receptor for HAMP recognition (link). Congrats Simon and Anthony! Adam’s twitter summary is here

entry.title: New work in Plant Journal
entry.content: A new publication describing the combined effects of wounding and HAMP treatment is available in The Plant Journal (link). Work was completed at UW with help of Tonio and Natalia!
entry.summary: A new publication describing the combined effects of wounding and HAMP treatment is available in The Plant Journal (link). Work was completed at UW with help of Tonio and Natalia!

entry.title: New review in Plant Cell
entry.content: Simon, Natalia, and Adam have a new long-form review in press at The Plant Cell. Adam’s twitter summary is here. Congrats!
entry.summary: Simon, Natalia, and Adam have a new long-form review in press at The Plant Cell. Adam’s twitter summary is here. Congrats!

entry.title: Rotation students Janet Solano Sanchez and Benjamin Downing

link.title: Rotation students Janet Solano Sanchez and Benjamin Downing

entry.content: Our lab will host two first year students for the Fall quarter, Janet and Ben. Welcome both!!
entry.summary: Our lab will host two first year students for the Fall quarter, Janet and Ben. Welcome both!!
